channel.title: Hiance Math Books :: Math Books for the Digital Age
channel.description: Hiance Math Books are collections of notes meticulously compiled and lovingly crafted for the sole purpose of allowing me to teach what I learn. I yearn to learn as much math as I can, and in the process am reviewing everything I learned in college. As I review, I write notes, and I want to share what I learn with everyone! The following chart shows my current plans, and the optimum path for anyone wanting to learn college level mathematics.
